<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> that allows only elements of a specific type to be allocated. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> that allows only elements of a specific type to be allocated.

This allows calling the destructor in <a href="#a9f4abb0f59d9fd2ce9dfe8ceebffcb38">DestroyAll()</a> and when the allocator is destroyed.

Definition at line 389 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/allocator-h">Allocator.h</a>.

### identifyObject() {#a27c295f65813bfb1dbb6ef1716cfa343}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}

  labels = {["inline"]}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
An index uniquely and reproducibly identifying an input pointer <code>Ptr</code> in the given allocator. Returns an empty optional if the pointer is not found in the allocator.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/allocator-h/#l00444">444</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/allocator-h">Allocator.h</a>.
